overview: If you can’t be at the Eurovision Song Contest in person, Adam Liaw will show you the best of Europe without using his passport - it’s all here in Australia. Our anointed Eurovision Foodie will show how the people of the European diasporas celebrate the Eurovision Song Contest in Australia - the music, the festivities, the favourite performers, and of course the food and drink. Destination Flavour Eurovision is the ultimate how-to guide for hosting your own Eurovision party.
title: Destination Flavour Eurovision
